byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and JONATHAN MARTIN

abstract: House Speaker John A Boehner's resignation will likely exacerbate divide within Republican party that has pitted hard-right faction against mainstream conservatives; while most immediate result of Boehner's announcement will likely be passing of temporary funding measures to prevent government shutdown, deepening split will most likely complicate lawmakers' agenda and impact presidential primary race.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Speaker John A. Boehner’s announcement that he would resign, the party’s internal struggle will be played out in Congress and the presidential race.

headline.main: John Boehner’s Move Deepens a Republican Chasm
headline.print_headline: Boehner’s Move Deepens a Republican Chasm

snippet: In the wake of Speaker John A. Boehner’s announcement that he would resign, the party’s internal struggle will be played out in Congress and the presidential race.
